name: Graveyard Dash (Michael Hense)
description:
A game where you play as a ghost and collect halloween candies to complete each level while avoiding spooky mummies that walk about.

This game game was developed with gamemaker studio with a team of 2 people.

Programmer: Michael Hense

Artist: Haley Lee

Download Instructions:
  1.  Download the executable
  2. Double click the downloaded executable to run
